title: Coronavirus: Mercedes F1 to make breathing aid
description: Thousands of the devices, which deliver oxygen to the lungs without needing a ventilator, could be made.

title: 'My $60m weight-loss app cured my personal pain'
description: Victoria Repa has created an app to help people lose weight, an issue she struggled with growing up.

title: The Marvel Spiderman artist teaching children in Ireland to draw
description: Irish artist Will Sliney is keeping thousands of kids entertained with daily drawing challenges.

title: Fair to award Liverpool title - Man City's Gundogan
description: It would only be "fair" to award Liverpool the title if the Premier League season is not completed, says Manchester City's Ilkay Gundogan.

description: Have you ever seen the streets of the capital so empty?

title: Anthony Yarde's father dies with coronavirus
description: Britain's Anthony Yarde urges people to stay at home after his father dies with coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Strict measures could last 'significant period'
description: The date the virus peaks will depend on how people behave, Cabinet Office minister Michael Gove says.

title: Season could continue until January - Ferrari boss
description: The world championship could extend into January next year as Formula 1 seeks to salvage the 2020 season, says Ferrari boss Mattia Binotto.

title: Billy Joe Saunders sorry after domestic violence 'advice' video
description: World champion Billy Joe Saunders apologises after posting a video in which he tells men how to hit their female partners during the coronavirus lockdown.

title: Coronavirus: Domestic abuse victims 'still allowed to leave home'
description: The government's coronavirus rules are tougher on people at risk of domestic abuse, the home secretary says.

title: Close-up footage of Arkansas tornado
description: An active weather front brings a rapid developing and destructive tornado to Arkansas

title: BBC Sport's five things to do today
description: Our team give you something to read, watch, try, listen and try - all in one place.

title: Coronavirus: From sold-out arenas to living room gigs
description: Recording artists are streaming gigs from their homes as self-isolation due to the coronavirus continues.

title: Man Utd v West Ham: Dimitri Payet scores spectacular FA Cup free-kick
description: As Dimitri Payet turns 33, BBC Sport looks back at his stunning free-kick against Manchester United in the 2016 FA Cup quarter-final at Old Trafford.

title: Lockdown, what lockdown? Sweden's unusual response to coronavirus
description: While swathes of Europe are under lockdown, Sweden is allowing life to go on much as normal.

description: The US president now says the move is not necessary, after the idea was labelled "preposterous".

title: Introducing the soaring melodies of Azure Ryder
description: How one of pop’s brightest new voices found confidence by taking control of a plane.

title: Coronavirus: Six things that are booming in sales
description: Amid the virus, some retailers are seeing trade collapse, but others are overwhelmed by demand.

description: Meet the people who have made it their mission to feed the National Health Service for free.

description: People social distancing are sharing memes to feel connected but could they be preserved in a museum?

description: There are many unanswered questions about the new coronavirus, Covid-19.
